txt.en: 'You did it, [placeholder]! Sithric will be locked up, for his proper place is in a prison. Stangard will be made right at last... and it is all thanks to you!'
'But -- [placeholder]! What are you doing here? Sithric has men looking for you at this very moment! You should run.\n\n'Why have you returned, friend? It must be urgent, if you are risking so much.'
Instance: A Daring Escape
'Free at last! Thank you, [placeholder]. I cannot believe the gall of Sithric, nor how deep corruption runs in his veins.\n\n'It is time to take back my city!'

'Go rally the men, and I will make my way to the Mead Hall to confront Sithric. The men are often in the inn at this time of night.\n\n'Meet me at the Mead Hall when you can -- I don't have the strength to fight Sithric alone now. I have not eaten or slept since I was locked up down here.'
Stanric is free -- and now Sithric must pay for his crimes
'There is nothing left for you to help with! You have freed us from Sithric's mad corruption at last.'
Stanric wants you to rally the men of Stangard while he makes his way to the Mead Hall
The men are enraged at the deception of Sithric
Stanric is in the lock-house.
Stanric is in the prison of Stangard.
Stanric is in the prison of Stangard.
Stanric is in the lock-house of Stangard.
The inn in Stangard is full of suspicious Rohirrim.
Athulf is in the tavern of Stangard with some equally suspicious men.
Stanric is now in the Mead Hall of Stangard.
Defend Stanric and defeat Sithric.
Stanric is in the Mead Hall.
Free Stanric from his bonds
Talk to Stanric
Help Stanric out of his cell
Listen to Stanric's plan
Rally the men in the inn
Tell Athulf of Sithric's deception
Talk to Stanric
Help Stanric take down Sithric once and for all
Talk to Stanric
Stanric is alive, defying the lies of Sithric. It is clear that Stanric must be freed at once, so that justice may be done for this betrayal.
'[placeholder], I must ask to borrow your strength this night. It looks to me like Sithric does not intend to go down without a fight.'
